description: This file defines FastAPI routes for CRUD operations on 'Note' objects, including creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes. It uses in-memory storage for notes, and includes route definitions, associated request/response models, and helper functions.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Pydantic model representing a note, including fields like id, title, content, created_at, and updated_at.

classes.name: NoteCreate
classes.description: Pydantic model for creating a new note, typically includes title and content.

classes.name: NoteUpdate
classes.description: Pydantic model for partially updating a note, with optional fields for title and content.

methods.name: datetime _now()
methods.description: Returns the current UTC time with timezone info.

methods.name: int _allocate_id()
methods.description: Allocates a new unique ID for a note.

methods.name: None delete_note(note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to delete"))
Note get_note(note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to retrieve"))
Note replace_note( note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to replace"), payload: NoteCreate = ..., )
Note update_note( note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to update"), payload: NoteUpdate = ..., )

ctags.name: delete_note
ctags.pattern: /^def delete_note(note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to delete")) -> None:$/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to delete"))

ctags.name: get_note
ctags.pattern: /^def get_note(note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to retrieve")) -> Note:$/
ctags.signature: (note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to retrieve"))

ctags.name: replace_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to replace"), payload: NoteCreate = ..., )

ctags.name: update_note
ctags.signature: ( note_id: int = Field(..., description="ID of the note to update"), payload: NoteUpdate = ..., )
